alert.note: Alert for Clayton (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 04 at 8:19PM CDT until July 05 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN CLAYTON COUNTY... At 818 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Volga, or near Elkader, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported brief funnel clouds northeast of Strawberry Point, IA. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Guttenberg around 900 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Fairview, Mederville, Garber, Motor, Elkport, Communia and Osterdock. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
